metadata.title: CVE-2022-4121 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In libetpan a null pointer dereference in mailimap_mailbox_data_status_freein low-level/imap/mailimap_types.c was found that could lead to a remotedenial of service or other potential consequences.

criterions.comment: libetpan: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
